name: War Dog Malice
flavor: At the start of any level 4 or higher war dog's turn, you can spend Malice to activate one of the following features.

effects.effect: The war dog activates a Malice feature available to war dogs of level 3 or lower.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Each target who has a loyalty collar shifts up to their speed, then is reduced to 0 Stamina. After each target's Loyalty Collar trait is resolved, each enemy adjacent to either target makes a Presence test.
effects.tier1: Push 4; the enemy is frightened of the nearest non-minion war dog (save ends)
effects.tier2: Push 2; the enemy is frightened of the nearest non-minion war dog (EoT)
